1605850.name: ZeroSpace
1605850.description:
ZeroSpace is a sci-fi hybrid strategy game that allows you to play as the commander of a galactic force. Harness the latest war technology that the Protectorate has to offer and recruit seasoned shock troopers and specialist crew members to your newly assigned fleet. Then navigate through political turmoil in the Orion sector as you make the hard choices to secure humanity's place in the galaxy.

An epic sci-fi story with choices that set up a galactic conflict

Make choices that change the universe, inspired by classic narrative RPGs like Mass Effect and Baldur's Gate. Build deep relationships with your crew and the heroes you enlist during the campaign.

Choose your strategy with over 11 factions and 14 heroes

Construct your strategic battle group by choosing to integrate from over 150 units and buildings, through 4 factions, 7 mercenary factions and 10 specialists, making each play-through different and unlocking more opportunities for dynamic counterplay.

Comfortable strategic and skill play

Feel comfortable with ZeroSpace's polished and streamlined UI. Comfort means you're doing exactly what you want without having to think about it. Want to draw your unit formation? Just right-click drag. Cast abilities through a shared ability UI without swapping tabs.

Challenge yourself further in the persistent, shared Galactic War with other players

Rank to become the dominant battle group in the sector as you take part in a living, breathing galaxy shared by thousands of real players. Defend your territory and conquer neighboring planets by leading a vast armada of troops, aliens, creatures, vehicles, and heavy weaponry- all for the glory of your alliance.

A Persistent, Multiplayer Galaxy Map

Coordinate alongside other alliance members to deploy troops on enemy planets, space stations and strongholds across the galaxy.

Features & Content

  • A singleplayer campaign with 15 main story missions, 10 hero loyalty missions, and 15 side story arc missions. With choices and dialog trees similar to Mass Effect and Baldur's Gate.

  • Hours of cinematic cutscenes and interactive dialogs where your choices dictate the game’s outcome.

  • 10 specialist heroes from various factions in campaign mode to build relationships with, or select from over 14 to lead your multiplayer games.

  • A separate, MMO Galaxy map with multiple game modes that contribute towards shared galactic conquest. (Co-op, Single-player, PvE, 2vAI, 2v2, Scenarios and 1v1)

  • 4 main factions - From a plant species to organic robots.

  • 7 mercenary factions - Delivering even more specialized battle groups

Wishlist ZeroSpace today!
1605850.supported_languages:
英语*, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
